thread.title: Romelu Lukaku Responds To His Current FIFA 17 Rating
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku Responds To His Current FIFA 17 Rating

title: Romelu Lukaku Responds To His Current FIFA 17 Rating
text:
Romelu Lukaku Responds To His Current FIFA 17 Rating Sat Feb 18 2017 15:44:59   15:44:59   
After Lincoln's win over Burnley earlier today I've started wondering if we're all just living in someone's Football Manager save. But it's actually FIFA 17 that Romelu Lukaku is focusing on. 
These days there's multiple reasons to keep an eye on which players of performing well in the Premier League from week to week that are outside of the results. 
First there's Fantasy Football, there won't be many fans who have had the blow of seeing their team concede slightly lessened by the goal being scored by someone in their 'Fantasy' team. 
As well as Fantasy Football there's also FIFA 17's Team of the Week to keep an eye on and the improvement for certain player's ratings because of their form. 
This week FIFA released some boosts and decreases in certain players ratings from the Premier League based on form for the whole season: Over 60 @premierleague players have had their ratings updated! Next league on Sunday. Full list -> https://t.co/hXs6MGJM5e #RatingsRefresh pic.twitter.com/BBnLGQKlIS - EA SPORTS FIFA (@EASPORTSFIFA) February 17, 2017 
Eden Hazard, Harry Kane and Alexis Sanchez were all boosted whilst Claudio Bravo was unsurprisingly on the other end of the change. 
However fans were quick to point out that one man who missed out was Romelu Lukaku, only the league's second top scorer: Fair play to @EASPORTSFIFA , must be giving Lukaku his own dedicated day for an upgrade:clap: - Harry (@HashtagHarry ) <a href=" https://twitter.com/HashtagHarry /status/832654063967703040">February 17, 2017 @EASPORTSFIFA @premierleague where the fuck is Lukaku? - Joey at The Ev (@lookmanlookmxn) February 17, 2017 
And the Belgian striker clearly wasn't too impressed himself but he did have a good remedy to get over his disappointment: It doesn't matter if i didn't get an upgrade on a videogame as long i'm improving in real life :soccer::smile: #ProEvoMightGiveMeOne .... - R.Lukaku Bolingoli10 (@RomeluLukaku9) February 18, 2017 
Pro Evo will be delighted. Sponsored Links
